name: Drive Two Cars
description:
Control the red car and the blue car at the same time. Collect all the circles and avoid the squares on the road.

The aim of the game is to get the maximum number of points getting the circles and avoiding the squares while you drive both cars. You can change the side of each car just typing the screen.

Also, the game includes Google Play Leaderboards so you can compare your scores with other players!

How to play the game

- Control the motard car and the Crimson car in same time

- Collect the circles

- Tap to change driveways

- Do not miss any circles

Also, the game includes Google Play Leaderboards so you can compare your scores with other players! Phone and Tablet support.

Challenge your friends, take your family members in this Drive Two Cars game Track your progress and keep moving! The only thing you need to do in the game, if you are clicking on the screen, this sometimes crazy :)
